_comment4: Copy this file to phantom.config.json and customize as needed.
_comment5: All fields starting with underscore (_) are documentation and ignored.

settings._default_profile_doc: Profile to use when none is specified (quick|standard|advanced|deep|security|compliance|devops)
settings._storage_path_doc: Where Phantom stores cloned repos and analysis data. Use ~ for home directory.
settings._parallel_jobs_doc: Number of analyzers to run in parallel. Higher = faster but more CPU/memory.
settings._analyzer_timeout_doc: Maximum seconds an analyzer can run before being killed.
settings._cache_ttl_doc: Hours to cache API responses (GitHub, npm registry, etc.)
settings._environment_doc: Environment variable names for API keys. Change if you use different names.

_analyzers_docs4: Each analyzer extracts specific data from repositories.
_analyzers_docs5: You can disable an analyzer by setting 'enabled: false'.
_analyzers_docs6: Custom analyzers can be added with a unique key and script path.

analyzers._dependencies_doc: Extracts SBOM from package manifests (package.json, requirements.txt, go.mod, etc.)

dependencies.name: Dependencies
dependencies.description: Extract package dependencies from manifests (package.json, requirements.txt, etc.)

analyzers._technology_doc: Identifies languages, frameworks, and tools by pattern matching imports and configs

technology.name: Technology Stack
technology.description: Identify frameworks, languages, and tools used in the codebase

analyzers._vulnerabilities_doc: Queries OSV database for known CVEs in dependencies

vulnerabilities.name: Vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.description: Scan dependencies for known CVEs using OSV database

analyzers._licenses_doc: Checks dependency licenses for GPL, copyleft, and compliance risks

licenses.name: License Compliance
licenses.description: Analyze dependency licenses for compliance risks

analyzers._package_health_doc: Detects abandoned packages (no updates >2 years), typosquatting suspects

package-health.name: Package Health
package-health.description: Check for abandoned, deprecated, or unhealthy dependencies

analyzers._security_findings_doc: Static analysis for SQL injection, XSS, command injection, etc.

security-findings.name: Code Security
security-findings.description: Static analysis for security vulnerabilities in source code

analyzers._iac_security_doc: Scans Terraform, CloudFormation, Kubernetes YAML for misconfigurations

iac-security.name: IaC Security
iac-security.description: Security scanning for Terraform, CloudFormation, Kubernetes configs

analyzers._secrets_doc: Pattern-based detection of API keys, passwords, tokens in code

secrets.name: Secrets Scanner
secrets.description: Detect exposed API keys, passwords, and credentials

analyzers._tech_debt_doc: Finds TODOs, FIXMEs, code duplication, and complexity hotspots

tech-debt.name: Technical Debt
tech-debt.description: Analyze code duplication, complexity, and TODO markers

analyzers._documentation_doc: Analyzes README quality, docs coverage, API documentation

documentation.name: Documentation
documentation.description: Analyze README, docs coverage, and documentation quality

analyzers._git_insights_doc: Commit frequency, contributor activity, branch patterns

git-insights.name: Git Insights
git-insights.description: Analyze commit patterns, contributors, and repository activity

analyzers._test_coverage_doc: Detects test frameworks (Jest, pytest, etc.) and estimates coverage

test-coverage.name: Test Coverage
test-coverage.description: Detect test frameworks and estimate test coverage

analyzers._auth_doc: Identifies OAuth, JWT, session handling, and auth provider usage

auth.name: Auth Analysis

analyzers._ownership_doc: Parses CODEOWNERS, git blame, identifies maintainers and bus factor

ownership.name: Code Ownership
ownership.description: Analyze CODEOWNERS, contributor patterns, and maintainership

analyzers._dora_doc: DORA metrics: deployment frequency, lead time, change failure rate

dora.name: DORA Metrics
dora.description: Calculate deployment frequency, lead time, and other DevOps metrics

analyzers._provenance_doc: SLSA provenance, signed commits, build attestations

provenance.name: Provenance
provenance.description: Verify build provenance and supply chain attestations (SLSA)

_profiles_docs4: Profiles define which analyzers run together. Use --quick, --standard, etc.
_profiles_docs5: Create custom profiles by adding new entries with unique keys.
_profiles_docs6: Profiles with 'requires_claude: true' need ANTHROPIC_API_KEY set.
